summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5758 for the improvement of Angeline Street, from 15th Avenue South to Columbian Way; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75945, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
